column3: sɛ idzi wo nyɛnko akagyinamu
column6: "Ma wɔdze w’anomu nsɛm esua wo efir
column7: Na wɔnam w’anomu nsɛm do akyer wo a;"

column3: afei iyi na yɛ fa gye woho
column4: Ɔnam dɛ atɔ wo nyɛnko nsamu ntsi; Kɛbrɛ woho adze
column5: na totɔ serɛ wo nyɛnko no."

column3: Mma nnda do so koraa."

column2: "Gye woho dɛ adoa a oefi ɔbɔfo nsamu
column3: Na dɛ anoma a oefi efirsuafo nsamu."
kɔ pataakowa nkyɛn; Sua n’akwan yie
Ɔhwɛdofo
Na ɔboaboa n’edzidzidze ano otwaber mu."
ebɛda ara ekodu dabɛn? Aber bɛn ara na ibenyan efi wo nda mu?"
nkomtɔ kakra

column2: "Ɔno na wo hia bɛba dɛ owifo
column3: Na w’ahokyer dɛ ɔbarimba a oemia."
ɔbarimba busuyɛfo; Ɔdze ano kɔntɔnkye nenam;"
ɔdze n’anan kasa
ɔpam ne tsirmu apam bɔn daa. Ɔhyɛ tɛkyerɛ mu gya."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi awerɛfir mu na no mbusu bɛba; Awerɛfir mu na wobobubu no
column3: na onnkenya edur."
esuon na ɔyɛ ekyiwadze ma no:"
ator tɛkyerɛma
column4: Nsa a ɔka bɔgya a odzi bem gu;"

column3: Anan a no ho yɛ har tu mbirika kɔtɔ mbusu mu;"
Na nyia ɔhyɛ enuanom mu tɛkyerɛ mu gya."
dzi w’egya ne mbrasɛm do
column4: Na mma mmpow wo na ne mbra:"

column3: Fa brabra wo kɔn mu."
obegya wo kwan; Sɛ eda hɔ a
column4: ɔbɔweɔn wo; Na sɛ inyan a

column2: "Na mbrasɛm yɛ kandzea; na mbra yɛ kan; Na nkyerɛkyerɛ ho nkaenyim yɛ nkwa no kwan:"
"Dɛ obesie wo efi ɔbaa bɔn no ho
column3: Efi ɔbaa sansanyi ne tɛkyerɛma dɔkɔdɔkɔ no ho."

column2: "Mma w’enyi mmber n’ahoɔfɛw wɔ w’akoma mu; Eso mma ɔmmfa n’enyisoatsɛw nnkyer wo."
"Na ɔbaa huhunyi tsirbo som paanoo sin bi: Naaso nyia ɔfa ɔbaa warfo dze
column3: ɔhwer ne nkwa a ɔsom bo."

column2: "Aso nyimpa botum aso gya egu no bo mu
column3: a ne ntar nnkɛhyew?"

column2: "Anaadɛ aso obi botum anantsew gyansenama do
column3: Na n’ananadze nnkɛhyew?"

column2: "Dɛm na nyia ɔkɔ ne nyɛnko ne yer nkyɛn no tse; Obiara a ɔdze ne nsa ka no no
column3: ɔnnkɛfa no ho tɔtrɔtɔ."
sɛ owia adze Dze amee ne kra ber a ɔkɔm adze no a:"
ɔno ɔbɔ ho mpɛn esuon hyɛ ananmu; Ɔdze ne fie ndzɛmba nyinara bɛma."

column2: "Obiara a ɔnye ɔbaa to awar no
column3: onnyim nyansa: Ɔyɛ adze a ɔbɛsɛɛ nankasa ne kra."

column2: "Epirapira na enyimguase na obenya; Na noho fi ngui no
column3: nnkɛpepa efi hɔ."

column2: "Nyinkun twetwee ɔbarimba n’ebufuhyew; Na onnkegyaa mu wɔ n’awerdzi da mu."
"Onnkobu mpata hwee; Eso sɛ ema akyɛdze pii mpo a
column3: no bo nnkɔdwe da."
